question1.question: Which of the following is a common design pattern for separating concerns in software architecture?

question2.question: Which design pattern is used to create a single instance of a class?

question3.question: Which is a principle of SOLID design?

question4.question: Which JavaScript feature allows you to define anonymous functions?

question5.question: Which of the following is an example of a NoSQL database?

question6.question: In object-oriented design, what principle encourages reducing interdependence between modules?

question7.question: Which of the following Git commands is used to create a new branch?

question8.question: Which leadership style is most effective for mentoring software engineers?

question9.question: What is the most important characteristic of a principal software engineer?

question10.question: Reverse the Order of Words in a String
question10.description:
Given an input string s, reverse the order of the words. A word is defined as a sequence of non-space characters. The words in s will be separated by at least one space.

Return a string of the words in reverse order, joined by a single space. Note that the returned string should not have leading or trailing spaces, and multiple spaces between words should be reduced to a single space.

constraints.characters: s contains English letters (upper-case and lower-case), digits, and spaces ' '. There is at least one word in s.
